synopsis.text: Tokyo serves as the backdrop for an enchanting tale revolving around an imperial opera company known as Kanadegumi in the anime "Sakura Taisen: Kanadegumi." The narrative centers on a young woman named Miyabi Neko, who finds herself entwined in intriguing interactions with five charismatic young men. This captivating story was initially bundled with a limited first edition of Shimada Chie's manga of the same name, inviting readers to immerse themselves in this unique world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
